title: How ‘Atlanta’ and ‘The Good Fight’ Chose Chaos
description: Two great but very different series, ending Thursday, decided that the most realistic portrait of America today is a surrealist one.
dc:creator: James Poniewozik
media:description: In the increasingly surreal world of “The Good Fight,” Diane Lockhart (Christine Baranski) therapeutically micro-doses psilocybin as the world falls apart.
